page.title: 19TEENAGERS IN BERKELEY VALE
page.content: In this area children in the age group 5-11 years go to{primary school}in nearby Berkeley, and those in the age group 11-16 go to the{secondary school in nearby Wanswell, which is about 2\ miles away.{Opinions vary}towards school, some like it because you get a chance to{meet friends,}others don't because of{homework}which interfers with their social life. Many consider a social life more important. The topics discussed include{Pop Music {Fashion, Television}and anything else that's currently around. The Pop of today is made up of music from the past 30 years as well as more modern stuff such as{Punk, Breakdance and {Heavy Metal.}Music, generally, plays an important part in local teenage lifestyles, being intimately involved in fashion, attitudes and simple entertainment.
